newsitem.title: SWEDEN: FORECAST-Swedish mobile phones sales 1.1 mln 1997.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Swedish mobile phones sales 1.1 mln 1997.

text.p: Swedish mobile telephone industry organisation MTL said on Friday it expected Swedes to buy some 1.1 million GSM mobile telephones in 1997, compared to 925,000 in 1996.
In a statement the group, Mobil Tele Leverantorerna, said NMT telephone sales would rise to 140,000 from 65,000 in 1996.

It said the number of mobile telephones sold was normally larger than the number of new mobile telephone subscriptions since older telephones were often replaced by new ones without adding a new subscription.
